instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3115-B no green light, turns on for 30 secs then shuts down
threads.message:
No visible corrosion, boots to OS with fan full speed then shuts down after about 30secs-1min. Also shuts down with everything disconnected. 

PPBUS_G3H: 12.24v

PP3V42_G3H: 3.5v

PP5V_S5: 5v

PP5V_SUS: 0v

PP3V3_S5: 3.3v

PP3V3_SUS: 0v

PP3V3_S4: 1.5v

PP3V3_S3: 0v

threads.title: 820-3115-B no green light, turns on for 30 secs then shuts down
threads.message: It also shuts down on smc bypass and safe mode

threads.title: 820-3115-B no green light, turns on for 30 secs then shuts down
820-3115-B no green light, turns on for 30 secs then shuts down
threads.message:
Did you try known good trackpad board/cable?
It can be a reason for full speed fan.
Does the fan spins to max from moment zero, or increases speed in 15-20s?

The above mentioned voltages took with machine turned on?

threads.title: 820-3115-B no green light, turns on for 30 secs then shuts down
threads.message:
It stills shuts down without trackpad connected. 

It takes about 2.5 secs to spin the fan, and it goes to max from momento zero. 

Voltages taken with machine turned off after it shuts down. Not enough time to take voltages with it turned on.

threads.title: 820-3115-B no green light, turns on for 30 secs then shuts down
threads.message:
You can take some voltages readings in 30s, for sure.
At least checking the big coils.
Restart it, if need more time to check another points.

Do you get correct AVREF_SMC?

threads.title: 820-3115-B no green light, turns on for 30 secs then shuts down
threads.message:
Voltages with board turned on:

PPBUS_G3H: 12.24v

PP3V42_G3H: 3.5v

PP5V_S5: 5.06v

PP5V_SUS: 5v

PP3V3_S5:  3.3v (not steady, it drops a lot)

PP3V3_S5_AVREF_SMC: 3.3v

PP3V3_SUS: 3.3v

PP3V3_S4: 3.3v 

PP3V3_S3: 3.3v  

PP1V8_S0: 1.8v

PP1V5_S3 : 1.5v

PP1V5_S0: 1.5v

PPVCORE_S0_CPU: 0.8v

threads.title: 820-3115-B no green light, turns on for 30 secs then shuts down
threads.message:
0.8V on CPU looks good; if drops from 1.15V initial.
However, you have a problem with SMC, or some of its signals; because PPBUS_G3H isn't controlled.
Check voltage and diode mode to ground at SCL/SDA lines of battery bus.

Remove internal HDD and test if stays on with USB macOS.
You can also test in boot menu.

threads.title: 820-3115-B no green light, turns on for 30 secs then shuts down
threads.message:
Its showing very unstable behaviors. At first it didn't shut down with macos usb (i even installed catalina from usb and it didnt shut down), but now it shuts down with catalina and capitan install usb´s.

At some point i thought the wifi was causing the shutdowns since every time i tried to connect to wifi it shut down, so i disconnected the wifi cable and it started to show green light and regular fan spin (maybe just a casualty). But now its back to fast fan/dim green light.

Diode mode to ground:

SMBUS_SMC_5_G3_SCL: 0.455

SMBUS_SMC_5_G3_SDA 0.455

threads.title: 820-3115-B no green light, turns on for 30 secs then shuts down
threads.message:
Did you test it disconnecting internal HDD?
Did it boot to USB macOS with normal fan speed?

Try known good trackpad cable/board.
Test again disconnecting webcam.

threads.title: 820-3115-B no green light, turns on for 30 secs then shuts down
threads.message:
Yeah, i disconnected internal HDD
No, still full fan speed. 

Tried it, no difference.
No difference with webcam disconnected.

threads.title: 820-3115-B no green light, turns on for 30 secs then shuts down
threads.message: Run corresponding EFI ASD, if possible.

threads.title: 820-3115-B no green light, turns on for 30 secs then shuts down
threads.message: Now the machine wont turn on, i have every rail except  PPVCORE_S0_CPU which is 0v.

threads.title: 820-3115-B no green light, turns on for 30 secs then shuts down
820-3115-B no green light, turns on for 30 secs then shuts down
threads.message:
R7402/03 have correct values.

CPUIMVP_VR_ON is 3.3v

threads.title: 820-3115-B no green light, turns on for 30 secs then shuts down
threads.message:
Possibly bad PCH, or CPU.
Did you try known good BIOS for sure?

threads.title: 820-3115-B no green light, turns on for 30 secs then shuts down
threads.message: Yes, just tried another one just in case.
